title: HELP ME I CANT PLAY LOL
body:
I have a Problem,first of all it was crashing when i was picking a champ and it Comes back ,then i coud pick champs but everytime i go in game it kikcs me out to repair,now when i get in game my loading Screen is 0% and suddenly goes to 100 but it says i am disconetcted and i cant gett in game and of Course get banns for nothing,pls help me
btw i have Windows 10

replies.body:
In addition to what QAPLA has suggested (which is all good advice), make sure your graphics card drivers are completely up to date as well, as outdated drivers can cause all sorts of weird conflicts.

You can also check out this support article: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes
It might have some helpful steps in it for you.
Also try looking up dns servers for league it may need to be changed... it used to do that to me until I changed the dns server on my internet settings

Have you tried running as admin and/or in compatibility for an earlier OS version?
Have you tried the repair function in the client?
Have you tried a complete reinstall (last resort)?
